title: Demoted to gold 3 for no reason
body: Today i got demoted to gold 3 for no reason.My mmr is gold 2.I understand that i lost 3 ranked games in a row but...in 2 of these i had an afk player.Sooooo why was i demoted?Ohh plus yesterday i won like 7 matches in a row and had plat 4 mmr.Rito fix ur rank sistem already

replies.body:
You lost 5 ranked games in a row, not 3. It looks like you were Gold 3 yesterday and only hit Gold 2 at the tail-end of your win streak you had.

So the loss streak sent you right back down.
